values.text: Glad I could help!
Okay, have a good day!
Thank you, see you later!
Oh, no, sorry to hear that. Can we try again?
I'm sorry that I am having trouble answering your questions. What can I do to help?
I'm sorry, maybe I'm not understanding you correctly. Can you try rewording your question? Hopefully, this will help me resolve your issue.

Or, visit our website: https://www.vmware.com/products/workspace-one.html

Instead of: "I already filed a ticket. I checked it yesterday. When will it be resolved?"

Instead of: "device"
Write: "I want to order a device"
